express_delivery.delivery_time: Zboží označené SKLADEM je možné vyzvednou po objednání okamžitě v otevírací dobu prodejny.

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: The store offers home delivery, parcel shop/locker pickup, and in-store pickup. PROVIDERS: Delivery partners include Česká pošta, GLS, DPD, and Zásilkovna. PRICING: Home delivery starts at 99 Kč, parcel shop/locker pickup starts at 49 Kč. Free shipping is available for all orders over 3,000 Kč. In-store pickup in Ostrava is free. The cash on delivery (COD) surcharge is a flat 39 Kč for all applicable methods. NOTABLE FEATURES: Standard delivery is very fast, typically the next business day for in-stock items ordered by 13:00. In-store pickup in Ostrava is available immediately for in-stock items and the store is open on Saturdays. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is exceptionally clear, comprehensive, and easy to locate on a dedicated page. Each delivery method is detailed with its provider, price, delivery time, COD options, and specific advantages. The free shipping threshold is prominently displayed.
